name: Renegade Dream
description:
First year ICAN student game called "Renegade Dream".

Plug in your controller and play as a bounty hunter facing her demons ! Use her trusty lasso to catch ennemis and throw them on one another ! 

Have fun & YEE AHH 

Game made in 4 months on Construct 2. 

The team :

ALPHONSE Anthony
